desc: Develop mobile app to run on both Android and IOS with server and infrastructure backend on AWS.1. Need one developer for front-end (Android and IOS) proficient in Swift & Objective C for IOS, Java for Android, and API development2.  Need a server-side developer for the back end (on AWS) proficient in Java, Python, Bash, SQL, PostGreSQL, API development, Git, CI/CD, and specific AWS services (EC2, API gateway, SNS, SQS, S3, Device Farm and Code Commit).  [Would prefer one person to do both front-end and backend]Development method is Agile (4-day sprints) and CI/CD.  Require full time commitment (8 hours a day) but will pay monthly with a bonus if project is completed within 3 months.  Both developers will work with a front-end designer and the company founder/software architect to develop mobile app which will incorporate features from 4 patents.  Front end IOS menu, flows for each menu service, and related use cases have been completed and will be shared following contract signing.
title: Develop mobile app -- front and backend

desc: We are a team of mobile apps developers.We are looking for an individual or a team to review a wireframe and proceed with a UI design for an Android mobile app.Total Budget: 250 EURWe have screens and APK you can use, however the design needs polishing and the wireframe need to be made perfect before we move into development. We will work along with you in every step. The work might require some changes along the way and we want someone patient enough to go through possible changes without charging us extra.Milestone 1: Figure out “theme/look” of the app. 3 Sample screens; each with 3-4 different designs, to figure out and select “theme/look” of the app. 30EUR / Deadline 2 daysMilestone 2: 1/4 of the screens (50% of the company side). 50 EUR / Deadline 2 daysMilestone 3: 2/4 of the work (100% of the company side). 50 EUR / Deadline 3 daysMilestone 4: 3/4 of the work (50% of the job seeker screens).  60EUR / Deadline 3 daysMilestone 5: 4/4 of the work (100% of the job seeker side). 60EUR / Deadline 3 daysWe will work alongside you giving regular feedback and answering any of your queries at any point in time!*Any changes that arise at any point during any milestone are included in the price**We pay every milestone with the equivalent submitted work done, therefore no prepayments.Submission of icons / pictures / hexadecimal code of colours / and finalized screens + any other related work done on actual screens (to make developing of app possible!)
title: Work on a UI Design for a mobile App

desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  I know this is super easy to build, since you are experienced developers. This way, high offers will not be accepted. This project is to develop a simple Android app as a model/draft for a multi users  different store owners. That means it will need to be ready for in the future multi vendors use it to register their products with specifications and so on. But this app will need to have functions that will make possible for it to be integrated in the future with a backend system. For now it needs registration fields for final users, where they can put their complete names, email, telephone and address and a function at the checkout that will allow users to mention if the delivery address is the same of the registration, if not, the person should inform which is. It should be ready to send email notifications of future orders statuses, but doesn't need to be now. It should be ready to receive a future function of GPS location that will allow the user to choose stores in a range of 30km. It is not now, but it should be ready for a future integration with a multi users back end website that will allow it to inform the sellers that they received orders. It should be ready to receive integrations of my country's payment methods, but the integration will not be done now.  For now it can be without backend system since it is a model/draft for a future functional app. The app will need to have some fictional products appearing just for test, and the test needs to allow complete buying experience until the checkout procedure.
title: Mobile development

desc: Mobile App for Marketplace1.	The System Include Level of users (Admin , Merchant &  Customers )2.	The system include all merchant in Market by country divided by sector ( food , furniture , Automotive , Jewelry , Clothing , …. )3.	open the App  select the Country  then the client can see his interest in the main page to app or he can see the default page.4.	The frame (Layout) of app consist of  frames : 1. Main (Gold) , 2. sliver 3. Platinum all of this frame (Layout) buy as sponsor for the merchant5.	the merchant admin can add the brands and branch for each brands also all information related to each brands and branch like brands manager name , email brands manager, mobile brands manager, branch manager name , email branch manager, mobile branch manager , location , target , points per bill also he/she can upload the photo , Album , video and offer in his place and the users related to this merchant can see and any user search on the app can see6.	merchant can send notification to all his customer who installed the app and SMS to customer he doesn’t have the app to install the app in his mobile.7.	the App include :1.	Offers & Hot Offers under offer tab and ( views by client interest  who download the app or by category also you can see when search for to see this item or to  see the offer for this brands )2.	Clients need to login the app and insert (name ,mobile, email , date of birth, location , also enable to location in the phone also he/she can login using the Facebook or google account )3.	Client can determine the available time he need to receive the notifications on his handset4.	Clients can hold any items in selected  branch for some times without any fee and the admin & merchant admin can decide the time period per merchant or per brands per merchant5.	Client can buy the items through the app without delivery or with delivery with extra fee and the merchant admin he but the price per item and the cost of delivery and the points per spent money in this brands or branch.6.	 the App include points system as rewards  when the customer buy using the system and for the merchant depends his customers and transactions:1.	Between the merchant and his customers ( the merchant decide of he get the point to his customers or not )2.	Between the app owner and merchant depends his customers and transactions on the app ( the App owner decide of he get the point to his merchant or not )3.	 Between the App Owner and customers (the App owner decide of he get the point to his customers or not )4.	Clients when installed the app he/she must enable the location which means we can monitor the location for each users which  means we can send a promotion and notification for each customers in specific zone (radius around km) Geo location. which means the customer can receive a notification messages to know more about the offer when he/ it is at a certain point5.	layout like [url removed, login to view] , [url removed, login to view] , Alibaba.com.6.	client can monitor the items  when he receive to  certain price7.	Client can compare between items  ( the same brands between merchant and the different brands in the same merchant and the compression include all aspects (Specifications) and price )8.	the merchant admin have admin page to insert, update and delete all information related to his market include information , goods, aspects (Specifications) , prices , location , quality , points, delivery , availability to hold the goods or not , if the client can buy through the app or not , if the client get the point when buy using the app or not , if there is  delivery the goods or not  , the price for goods , the delivery using the merchant or app manger (corporate he created the app)9.	Client can share items and description  and invite  with any social media channel like ( Facebook , twitter , Instagram , LinkedIn , snapchat , WhatApp

desc: Im looking for someone who can take an existing AVD that runs on windows, and install it on a linux server. The android is port forwarding,( adb forward tcp:8088 tcp:8088 )Right now i have a software that relies on avd to run, And it currently connects via [url removed, login to view] only on the computer running avd, i would like to connect to the linux server instead and this way dont need avd running on my computer. Is this possible?
title: Run existing android emulator AVD to a linux server and port forward?
